verses.name: Song of Songs 7:5
verses.text: Thine head upon thee is like Carmel, and the hair of thine head like purple; the king is held in the galleries.

verses.name: Song of Songs 7:6
verses.text: How fair and how pleasant art thou, O love, for delights!

verses.name: Song of Songs 7:7
verses.text: This thy stature is like to a palm tree, and thy breasts to clusters of grapes.

verses.name: Song of Songs 7:8
verses.text: I said, I will go up to the palm tree, I will take hold of the boughs thereof: now also thy breasts shall be as clusters of the vine, and the smell of thy nose like apples;
